review: The Amazon Fire TV Stock is amazing! Well worth the purchase--we have eliminated Cable TV. My only issue is the menu style; I prefer a list view menu and the Fire Stick uses a scrolling menu. Overall a great product, especially for Amazon Prime members!

review: MIRRORING function does not work well. so I returned it because I bought it for mirroring function. for cell phone mirroring, you have to download application on both fire tv stick and your phone. and you have to open app on both tv stick and your phone in order to mirror. it is not like one touch and go. and for the laptop mirroring, you have to go to "setting menu" and enable mirroring function and pair your laptop. you have to do this every time you want to use this function. other function and quality is pretty good, but I give 2 stars because all I needed was convenient mirroring function.
